name: O.R.B. Offensive Rolling Bot
description:
O.R.B. is a retro style 2D action platformer, developed by Karva Games.  Here you can download the alpha-demo of the game. We hope to have your feedback to make our game better.

Overview

O.R.B. is a 2D run ‘n’ gun platformer, where you play as O.R.B., a small robot sent from the future to the past to save the world from DiOS, the genocidal AI. With your ability to transform into a ball and back you must use these forms to roll, bounce and shoot your way through various levels, different enemies and epic bosses to stop DiOS from erasing the whole human race.

How to play

- O.R.B’s movement is controlled with the keyboard.
- Shooting and transforming are used with the mouse.

DISCLAIMER!
If you want to use the controller, you can enable it from the Options menu.
